DMUEditFormatsHdr.Title: Formats
DMUEditFormatsHdr.LongHelp: If there is no format created in the loaded markup, a new format is created.
DMUExitFormatsHdr.Title: Exit Formats
DMUExitFormatsHdr.ShortHelp: Exits from the format edit mode. This command is only available in the format edit mode.
DMUUpdateFormatSessionOverloadHdr.Title: Update Viewpoint
DMUUpdateFormatSessionOverloadHdr.ShortH: Updates the viewpoint of the slide
DMUFormatChooserHdr.Title: Format...
DMUFormatChooserHdr.ShortHelp: Associate a format to a slide
